title: DJ Caise
text:
Derin Phillips, better known as DJ Caise (pronounced as "Case"), is a Nigerian <a href="disc%20jockey">disc jockey</a>.
Life and music career.
DJ Caise was born to the family of Mr & Mrs Phillips. His maternal grandfather, the late Chief <a href="Antonio%20Deinde%20Fernandez">Antonio Deinde Fernandez</a>, was a Nigerian <a href="business%20magnate">business magnate</a>, <a href="diplomat">diplomat</a> and Permanent <a href="Central%20African%20Republic">Representative of Central African Republic</a> to the <a href="United%20Nations">United Nations</a>. Chief Fernandez' daughter, his mum Chief (Mrs) Teju Phillips, is a former commissioner of <a href="Lagos%20State">Lagos State</a>.
DJ Caise interest in music started during his time at <a href="University%20of%20Reading">University of Reading</a>.
DJ Caise was on "<a href="BBC%20Radio%201Xtra">BBC Radio 1Xtra</a>" with "<a href="Mista%20Silva">Mista Silva</a>", "<a href="C4%20Pedro">C4 Pedro</a>" & "pt:Big Nelo.
Record Deal: Chocolate City.
DJ Caise got signed to <a href="Chocolate%20City%20%28music%20label%29">Chocolate City</a> in 2011.
OAP: <a href="The%20Beat%2099.9%20FM">The Beat 99.9 FM</a>.
DJ Caise is best known for hosting DJ Caise In The Mix, which is held every friday night from 9pm to 7am on <a href="The%20Beat%2099.9%20FM">The Beat 99.9 FM</a>.
Education.
He attended the <a href="University%20of%20Reading">University of Reading</a> in "Reading, where he studied Finance. He also acquired his master's degree in Finance, as well as a bachelor's degree in Economics.
Music.
He was trained at <a href="Point%20Blank%20Music%20College">Point Blank Music College</a> in <a href="Hoxton">Hoxton</a>, North London, Los Angeles.
2015 - 16.
Album.
On November 30, 2015, DJ Caise announced the release of his debut album to be out in May 2016.
Tours.
<a href="Hennessy">Hennessy</a> artist club tour.
In 2011, the <a href="Hennessy">Hennessy</a> artiste club tour took off with the likes of <a href="Praiz">Praiz</a>, DJ Caise, <a href="DJ%20Spinall">DJ Spinall</a>, Slyde, Bizzle, and Sammy.
Magazine.
Blanck Magazine.
In August 2016, DJ Caise was featured in Blanck Magazine.
Notable performances.
He has performed in several popular events and shows since he rise to stardom, performed in events like:
